txt.en: 'For the last few days, smoke has been rising from Makham Mijann, perhaps from a single camp-fire. I can't imagine anyone would be eager to hide out in an abandoned Corsair war-camp, unless they held some sort of ill intent.\n\n'Obviously, I cannot leave my post, but I see that you're quite familiar with adventuring. Will you investigate in my stead?'
Talk to Halnith
Check on Kakhât
The Corsair narrows his eyes at you

'Had I known what was happening at that camp-fire... but I did not, and he was beyond help. To die nameless and forsaken in an unfamiliar place... I only hope your actions gave him some semblance of peace.'

Halnith reaches down to gently pet the hound, who only responds with a tired thump of his tail.

'I daresay he's found his new home.' A smile breaks across Halnith's face. 'Guarding the beacon doesn't sound like such a lonely task anymore.'
TBD
Kakhât sniffs your hand. Before the hound leaves his master's side, he looks to him -- for further commands, perhaps. But the Corsair utters no more words.
Makham Mijann may not be fully abandoned.
Upon arriving at Nendath, Kakhât barked at you.\n\nYou should check on him.
You have found a dying Corsair hiding in a tent at Makham Mijann.\n\nYou should talk to him.
There is nothing you can do for the dying Corsair, but he has asked you to take his war-hound Kakhât with you.\n\nYou should approach Kakhât.
Use the whistle to summon Kakhât to your side

'Nothing you can do will hurt me, stranger. I'll be gone soon. Curse the warmongers that took me so far from home. May the seas take them all! May they --'

Whatever the Corsair intends to say next devolves into a series of dry, rattling coughs.

'Still listening to this dying man's last words? Then...' With a trembling hand, he reaches out to pet his war-hound. 'Take this whistle, and Kakhât will follow. He was never made for war. He doesn't deserve the same sad end that I do.

'Leave me, Kakhât. Go.'
Return to Halnith at Nendath
Investigate the lit camp-fire at Makham Mijann
Use the whistle to summon Kakhât to your side
You should return to Halnith at Nendath with your new companion.\n\nNendath stands to the south of Makham Mijann.
TBD
Halnith has sighted smoke rising from a lit camp-fire in Makham Mijann. You should investigate.\n\nMakham Mijann is located to the north of Nendath.
Talk to the dying Corsair
Kakhât abruptly trots over to Halnith's side and lies down. Something tells you that even if you used the whistle to call him, he would simply refuse to listen.
What Was Left Behind
You should tell Halnith what you found at Makham Mijann.\n\nShe stands guard at Nendath.
Approach Kakhât
Kakhât softly barks at you
